# Spiked Armor
## Overview
You can outfit your armor with spikes, which can deal damage in a grapple or as a separate attack. See Armor, for details.


-tx-
| **Martial Weapon** ||||||||||
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| | **Light Melee Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** | ** Special** |
| | Spiked armor | Special | 1d4 | 1d6 | x2 | — | Special | P | — |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 148
